metadata.title: Genetic lesions within the 3a gene of SARS-CoV

abstract.original_text: A series of frameshift mutations within the 3a gene has been observed in culture-derived severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV). We report here that viral RNA from clinical samples obtained from SARS-CoV infected patients also contains a heterogeneous population of wild-type and mutant 3a transcripts.

sentences.segment_text: A series of frameshift mutations within the 3a gene has been observed in culture-derived severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus ( SARS-CoV ) .
We report here that viral RNA from clinical samples obtained from SARS-CoV infected patients also contains a heterogeneous population of wild-type and mutant 3a transcripts .
